name: Cat Owner Simulator
description:
This is Cat Owner Simulator. Me and my team made this game in 48 hours for the Norther Game Design Challenge.

In Cat Owner Simulator you are a cat owner looking after your colony of cats. Make money by posting cat photos to your blog and generating ad revenue. Head on over to catazon to purchase cats and other supplies. Make sure to keep your cats fed and look after their every need.
